text: Va Ust, ki sumoro saʙ hangomi xoʙ ruhatonro megirad ci gunae ki dar vaqti marg memironad va har ci dar ruz kardaed, medonad, on goh ʙomdodon ruhatonro ʙa cismhojaton ʙargardonda sumoro zinda (ʙedor) mesozad, to on hangom, ki muddati muajjani umraton dar dunjo ʙa pojon rasad. Sipas ʙozgastaton ʙa nazdi Ust va sumoro dar ruzi qijomat az on ci kardaed, ogoh mesozad, sipas muvofiqi on cazojaton medihad
